column1: #text=When I was riding my bike last week I must have ran over something sharp , because when I got home I noticed that the front tire was flat .
#text=This was annoying especially since I did n't have the equipment to fix it .
#text=So later that day I drove over to the local sports store and bought a new tire inner tube and an air pump .
#text=When I got home I took out the old punctured inner tube from the tire and replaced it with the new once .
#text=I then unscrewed the air cap on the tire and attached the air pump .
#text=I began pumping air into the tire , it took about 30 pumps before it was fully filled up with air .
#text=I then got on the bike and tested it to see how it would hold up .
#text=I rode around happy that it was fixed , and also happy that I now had the equipment to fix it again if it went flat in the future .
